Hey A/V qulaity on this is great, but I don't know how to get the subs working. Normally i burn vids using nero express, but just being able to watch this would be just dandy. Plz help.
Ditto on the subtitles . . . how can they be added?
The subtitles instructions are on a page somewhere that I can't remeber If Somebody does that would be great, this is a great movie thanks to elsebababe

To play the subs, place them in the same folder with the movie.They must both have the same name. If this doesn't work you probably lack some codec. I use media player classic which comes with k-lite mega codec pack.
Thx for uploading this, but PLZ SEED..! ;)
